TOUR.COLORS: These colored squares are meant to fill the containers below. To move square click on it then click on container
TOUR.B_ADD: Use these buttons to add or remove colors
TOUR.CONTAINERS: These are containers. To change play board you can drag and drop squares
TOUR.B_CLEAR: Clear containers to start from scratch
TOUR.B_SAVE: Save current board to continue later
TOUR.B_LOAD: Load saved play board to continue
TOUR.B_SOLVE: Solve the game. This means AI will try to sort the colors into the containers
TOUR.B_PLAY: Play the game. Try to sort the colors into the containers

NO_SOLUTION: Oops, the play board has no solution :(
